componentID.description: common component identifying information, such as mpn

pdVersion.description: version of power delivery spec implemented by controller

usbTypecRevision.description: usb type-c spec revision implemented by controller

fastRoleSwapSupport.description: whether the pd controller supports fast role swap (FRS)

vconnPowerSupport.description: whether the pd controller has support for vconn power

vconnPowerLimit.description: power limit supported by internal vconn switch (if supported)

vconnMaxCurrent.description: maximum continuous current supported by internal vconn switch (if supported)

vconnOverCurrentLimit.description: over current limit supported by internal vconn switch (if supported)

integratedVbusDischargeSwitch.description: whether the pd controller has one or more integrated vbus discharge switches

integratedLoadSwitch.description: whether the pd controller has one or more integrated load switches

maxSinkCurrent.description: maximum continuous current supported by pd controller integrated sink load switch

maxSourceCurrent.description: maximum continuous current supported by pd controller integrated source load switch

sinkfetOverCurrentLimit.description: over current limit supported by pd controller integrated sink load switch

sourcefetOverCurrentLimit.description: over current limit supported by pd controller integrated source load switch

onResistanceSinkFet.description: on-resistance of the integrated sink load switch

onResistanceSourceFet.description: on-resistance of the integrated source load switch

activeCurrent.description: active current of pd controller (during PD communication)

idleCurrent.description: idle current of pd controller (cable connected but no PD communiation)

thermalShudownThresholdRising.description: Thermal Shudown (tsd) Threshold with temperature rising

thermalShudownThresholdFalling.description: Thermal Shudown (tsd) Threshold with temperature falling

vbusOvervoltageProtectionThresholdRising.description: Overvoltage Protection (OVP) Threshold with vbus voltage rising

vbusOvervoltageProtectionThresholdFallin.description: Overvoltage Protection (OVP) Threshold with vbus voltage falling

vbusUndervoltageLockoutThresholdRising.description: Undervoltage Lockout Out (UVLO) Threshold with vbus voltage rising

vbusUndervoltageLockoutThresholdFalling.description: Undervoltage Lockout Out (UVLO) Threshold with vbus voltage rising

vconnOvervoltageProtectionThresholdRisin.description: Overvoltage Protection (OVP) Threshold with vconn voltage rising

vconnOvervoltageProtectionThresholdFalli.description: Overvoltage Protection (OVP) Threshold with vconn voltage falling

vconnUndervoltageLockoutThresholdRising.description: Undervoltage Lockout Out (UVLO) Threshold with vconn voltage rising

vconnUndervoltageLockoutThresholdFalling.description: Undervoltage Lockout Out (UVLO) Threshold with vconn voltage rising

pins.description: array of pin objects with associated properties
